result.eng: Would you like to have sex with me?

result.eng: Peel the onion and cut it in slices.
result.ga: Bain an craiceann den oinniún agus gearr ina shlisní é

result.eng: You'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.
result.ga: Cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oíche
result.orig: Cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oíche

result.ponchtml: Ċeapfá óna gcuid cainte go raiḃ siad ag bualaḋ craicinn gaċ oíċeYou'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.

result.eng: It scares me to my skin.
result.ga: Cuireann sé eagla mo chraicinn orm
result.orig: Cuireann sé eagla mo chraicinn orm
result.html: Cuireann sé eagla mo chraicinn ormIt scares me to my skin.
result.ponchtml: Cuireann sé eagla mo ċraicinn ormIt scares me to my skin.

result.eng: We were scared shitless that the bus would be late.
result.ga: Bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbus
result.orig: Bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbus

result.ponchtml: Ḃí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbusWe were scared shitless that the bus would be late.

result.eng: A light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.
result.ga: D'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíocht
result.orig: D'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíocht

result.ponchtml: D'ḟan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a ċuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faoḃar ar a cruṫaíoċtA light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.
